name: unfeasibly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is not feasible (= able to be done or achieved): There was a blonde woman with an unfeasibly large amount of luggage. The closure of the tunnel has made the return journey unfeasibly long. See
unfeasible
More examplesFewer examplesThe project is both impractical and unfeasibly expensive.I don't think people want to see unfeasibly handsome, successful people doing well.She asked him to reach for something on an unfeasibly high shelf.
